participant_1.background:
I train to stay in peak physical condition for my job.
I was a computer programmer before I started my own business.
I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers.
I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about the natural world and how it can be used to create a more sustainable future for my family.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
I love to jam out on my guitar.
I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
i don t drive.

content.text: I'm doing okay! How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
That's awesome! I love swimming too! I used to be a competitive swimmer when I was younger.
That's so cool! I wish I could have been a competitive swimmer when I was younger. I'm just training to stay in peak physical condition for my job.
What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer! I love helping people get in shape and improve their overall health.
That's amazing! I'm sure you're really good at it.
Thank you! I try my best! I'm really passionate about it.
I can tell! What's your favorite part of your job?
My favorite part of my job is seeing the progress my clients make. It's so rewarding to help people achieve their fitness goals.
That's so great! You sound like a really great person.
Thank you! I try my best to be.
I'm sure you are! What are your other interests?
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas. I also love to cook and bake.
That's so cute! I love koalas too! I'm not very good at cooking or baking, but I do enjoy it.
Cooking and baking are definitely not my strong suits either, but I love doing it for my family.
